blocks.heading: What We Cover
blocks.body: A Practical Crash-Course Grounded in Research

accordionItems.label: How LLMs Think
accordionItems.content: Tokens, context, randomness—explained in plain English so the next answer feels less like magic.

accordionItems.label: Choosing the Right Model
accordionItems.content: When to pick ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini, and why it matters.

accordionItems.label: Prompt Patterns That Work
accordionItems.content: Role prompts, chain-of-thought, retrieval tricks. Tested with hundreds of managers and devs.

accordionItems.label: Real-World Projects
accordionItems.content:
Synthesise web research into a briefing note. 

Analyse a messy spreadsheet in minutes. 

Draft clean code plus unit tests.
